content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I hope you like the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price. I am looking for the highest price possible, so feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am a reliable and dependable student. I am willing to pay 600 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a higher price. Please feel free to make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Taking into consideration the unfurnished state of the apartment and its location, I am willing to pay 650 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a better offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please feel free to make another offer.

content: Understood. Considering the newly built condition of the apartment, I propose 700 euros per month.

content: That's a good offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please feel free to make another offer.
